subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Facing the Wolverines in the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since the 1992 national championship game, the Blue Devils hung on in the final seconds.
snippet: Facing the Wolverines in the N.C.A.A. tournament for the first time since the 1992 national championship game, the Blue Devils hung on in the final seconds.
